Name: Rite of Resurrection
Title: Qiqi: Rite of Resurrection
Source: Reward for inviting Qiqi to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Rite of Resurrection
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1108]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1108] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S11083]</color> once.
After your $[A1108], who has this card equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S11083]</color>, she revives all your fallen characters and heals them for 2 HP. (Can happen 2 times per match)
(You must have $[A1108] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.
